title: Drag and drop problem
body: So I can't drag and drop when creating item sets or runes. I've tried restarting the computer and LoL multiple times, doesn't work. I'm on a Mac. Anyone have any advice?

replies.body: Are you running macOS Sierra, because I've seen some mouse issues reported recently. If not, are you using a touchpad or an external mouse when you try editing your item sets or runes?

I'm also on a Mac and having this same problem. I can't create item sets or drag and drop runes. I'm using Sierra and I have an external mouse, but it wouldn't work with the trackpad, either. Any idea of how to fix this?

It's a known bug with macOS Sierra and the League client. There's no fix at the moment, but it's on our radar for investigation. At the moment the easiest workaround may be to edit your item sets on another PC not running macOS Sierra, as the changes will be saved on the cloud.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Have you worked on a fix yet ? I have the same problem
Still waiting on a fix for this.....bump.
